mapper.update: update lottery_other_people set house_id = #{houseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, people_id = #{peopleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, identity_num = #{identityNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, record_num = #{recordNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where other_people_id = #{otherPeopleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select other_people_id, house_id, people_id, `name`, identity_num, record_num from lottery_other_people
